title: Ticket #1665: search for existing auto cluster is O(N)
description:
The schedd's AutoCluster::getAutoCluster() does a linear search for the auto cluster signature. This scales as O(N) in the number of auto clusters.

With a queue of 100000 jobs having 10 jobs per auto cluster, I found that it took 93s to build the list of prioritized jobs for matchmaking. Replacing the linear search with an O(log(N)) search reduced the time to 9s.
